ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When the earth is convulsed with its quaking
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: WHEN THE WORLD is shaken up by its cataclysm,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When the earth will be shaken with a mighty shaking,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When the earth is shaken by a terrible quake
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When the earth is shaken with its appointed tremor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When the earth quakes with its Zilzal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When the earth is shaken with her (violent) shaking,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When earth is shaken with a mighty shaking
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When Earth is shaken with her (final) earthquake
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When the earth is shaken with its violent shaking,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: When the earth is shaken by the shaking thereof,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When the earth is rocked with a terrible quake
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When the earth is shaken to her (utmost) convulsion,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When the earth is shaken with its (final) earthquake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When the earth is shaken with its mighty shaking,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When the earth is shaken with its quake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [99:1] When earth is shaken, [when] it is rocked for the rising of the Hour, with its [final] quake, with its most violent rocking, one that befits its magnitude,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said about the interpretation of Allah's saying (When Earth is shaken with her (final) earthquake): '(When Earth is shaken with her (final) earthquake) He says: the earth is shaken and quaking and all that which is on it of trees, mountains and building is crumbling down
